mapper.sql: (select unqualify_apply_id,product_id,unqualify_item,unqualify_count,assembly_date,un.emp_id,emp_name,apply_date,un.note from unqualify_apply un,employee e where un.emp_id = e.emp_id limit #{offset},${rows})
mapper.select: select unqualify_apply_id,one.product_id,product_name,unqualify_item,unqualify_count,assembly_date,one.emp_id,emp_name,apply_date,one.note from as one,product p where one.product_id = p.product_id
mapper.update: update unqualify_apply set note=#{note} where unqualify_apply_id=#{id}
